com.artemis.annotations

Annotation Type EntityId


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface EntityId

    Marks int and IntBag fields as holding entity id:s. Only works on component types. This annotation ensures that:

    • Entity references can be safely serialized
    • Tracks inter-entity relationships, if the EntityLinkManager is registed with the world.
    Only supports public fields. Kotlin requires fields with this annotation to also be annotated with @JvmField.

    Annotation has no effect on Bag-of-entities and plain Entity fields.

    See Also:
    Entity References and Serialization
